jcr:content.jcr:title: List of political parties in Barbados

contentheadline.headline: List of political parties in Barbados

contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of Barbados}} This article lists '''political parties in Barbados'''. [[Barbados]] has a [[two-party system]], which means that there are two dominant [[political party|political parties]], with extreme difficulty for anybody to achieve electoral success under the banner of any other party. Occasionally various members of political parties in Barbados have used an option of [[crossing the floor]]. ==The parties== ===Represented in Parliament=== *[[Barbados Labour Party]] (BLP) *[[Democratic Labour Party (Barbados)|Democratic Labour Party]] (DLP) ===Defunct/others/independents=== *Barbados National Party (BNP) *[[Clement Payne Movement]] (CPM) *[[National Democratic Party (Barbados)|National Democratic Party]] (NDP) *[[Pan-Caribbean Congress]] (PCP) *[[People's Empowerment Party]]<ref>{{cite web|url=http://web.archive.org/web/20060313074217/http://www.nationnews.com/story/285187268853498.php |title=The Nation Newspaper | PEP: Power to the people |publisher=Web.archive.org |date= |accessdate=2013-04-22}}</ref> (PEP) *People's Political Alliance (PPA) *[[People's Progressive Movement (Barbados)|People's Progressive Movement]] (PPM) *[[Worker's Party of Barbados]] (WPB) ==References== {{Reflist}} ==See also== * [[Politics of Barbados]] * [[List of political parties by country]] {{Barbadian political parties}} {{North America in topic|List of political parties in}} [[Category:Political parties in Barbados| ]] [[Category:Politics of Barbados]] [[Category:Barbados politics-related lists|Political parties]] [[Category:Lists of political parties|Barbados]]
